On 21/09/2007, Kris Carpenter <kcarpenter@...> wrote:
> The Heritrix Development team will be putting out a preview release soon
>  for Heritrix 2.x and we'd like to enlist a broad number of testers to
>  experiment with the code.

Hi,

We're using Heritrix for populating Watson ontology search engine [1];
I would be interested to test 2.x version especially if it is a Maven
2 build.

[1] http://watson.kmi.open.ac.uk/

Cheers,
-- 
Laurian Gridinoc, purl.org/net/laur
